Very cute, great color, thick material. Washed well in the washing machine with minimal shrinkage.
Both warm and comfortable to use as an outer layer.  Perfect wardrobe staple.

This sweater is perfect weight and is a nice quality  to wear out to the playground on cold days.
Love this oversized sweater, it's casual and so comfortable!!  Might get it in another color as well!  Goes great with jeans and leggings!!

This is an awesome sweater.  Nice and heavy and well made.  I’ve had this for months and it still looks brand new.

Thick sweater, comfortable and cozy.  Not nearly as oversized as shown in the photo.
This cardigan is perfect!  It is over sized and very warm and comfortable!  Would definitely purchase again!

The price was amazing for such great quality sweater. I bought it for a friend and went back to get another one because of the price and Quality. The material was great and the fit is comfortable.

This is a beautiful sweater that is so soft and comfortable to wear. You cannot feel the weight when you put it on, it just feels lovely on me…the softness of it, plus it keeps me warm without making me feel like I’m wearing a furnace is a win for me.  I would definitely recommend.

Very nice but the sleeves are a little short for me.
the material does not feel cheap and the oversize look is so cute!

This cardigan is THICK and heavy. I was taken aback by the heft it carries. It is a thick material, definitely ideal for the colder seasons. It's not long, doesn't cover the butt. Has no shape to the cardigan. Looks frumpy. It's cozy but not fashionable. I wouldn't repurchase.

I’m 5’5” and 180 and ordered the XL to be loose and it’s perfect. A large would fit but I like baggier sweaters. It’s so so so soft and perfect for work, lounging around, really anything. I’m deff buying more colors! The only downside is I wish it had pockets but that’s minor. I’d give this 100 stars if i could!!
Great thick material and well made but is way more of a yellow cream and not my fav unfortunately.
Surprisingly soft and stretchy. Color actually looks better in person.

I usually wear a size small in cardigans and ordered a medium for an even more oversized fit over leggings. The cardigan was ridiculously large and looks like it would fit a women’s XXXL. If you really want to order this, I suggest getting at least two to three sizes smaller than your usual size.
